thread.title: Senators blast cost increases on U.S. Navy aircraft carrier
thread.title_full: Senators blast cost increases on U.S. Navy aircraft carrier - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Senators blast cost increases on U.S. Navy aircraft carrier
text: Washington (Reuters) - Senator John McCain on Thursday said huge cost overruns on a new class of aircraft carriers built by Huntington Ingalls Industries Inc made it " one of the most spectacular acquisition debacles " in recent years, and the Navy needed different options for the future.
